meanings.definition: Sloppy or untidy in appearance or habits.
meanings.sent1: The slovenliest room in the house had clothes scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: She always looked slovenliest on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent3: His desk was the slovenliest in the office, with papers flying around like confetti.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a slovenliest jungle of weeds and overgrown bushes.
meanings.sent5: The slovenliest student in class never remembered to bring a pencil.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of slovenly, meaning the most sloppy or untidy.
meanings.sent1: Among the group, she was known as the slovenliest, always misplacing her belongings.
meanings.sent2: The slovenliest in the family was often teased for their messy room.
meanings.sent3: The slovenliest at the party managed to spill punch on themselves within minutes.
meanings.sent4: In a room full of neat freaks, he stood out as the slovenliest, with his wrinkled shirt and unkempt hair.
meanings.sent5: The attic was a treasure trove for the slovenliest, filled with forgotten items and dust.
